name: PaddlePunks
description:
https://discord.gg/f36Nv8XepT

PaddlePunks is an underground fighting tennis game with local play against several levels of AI difficulty, as well as online and local multiplayer.

There's a cast of characters that all play quite differently. Want to force your opponent to play breakout instead of pong? Pick wizard.

The game is still quite early in development and the assets are largely placeholders (there to get a feel for how things work) but the gameplay itself is solid.

Multiplayer

You shouldn't need to forward ports, but if people have trouble connecting, forward whatever port you want to use. Default is 2222. 

Controls Directions: Arrows, WASD, D-Pad, Left Analogue Stick A (Normal) Z, H, Gamepad X B (Special) X, J, Gamepad Y C (Super) C, K, Gamepad B, Gamepad Right Bumper D (Dash) Shift, Space, Gamepad A E (Emote) E, O, Gamepad Left Bumper Movelist Default: → A Fast Straight ↖/↑/↗/↘/↓/↙ A Directional Hit ← A Parry ↑/↓ B Curve → B Slam ← C Super Catch (1 meter) ↖/↑/↗/↘/↓/↙ C Super Curve (2 meter) Ninja: ↖/↑/↗/→/↘/↓/↙ A Directional Hit ↖/↑/↗/↘/↓/↙ B Slide ← B Invisibiity ← C Knife (1 meter) ↗/→/↘ C Ballusions (1 meter) Wizard: ↖/↑/↗/→/↘/↓/↙ A Directional Hit ↑/→/↓ B Directional Wall ← B Reflection Wall ↑/↗/→/↘/↓ C Invisiball (1 meter) ← C Controllball (2 meter) Grabber: A Advancing Hit ↖/↑/↗/→/↘/↓/↙ A Directional Hit ← A Parry ←/↖/↑/↗/→/↘/↓/↙ B, B Grapple ↑/↓ C Swinging Hit (1 meter) ↗/→/↘ C Extending Hit (1 meter) Homura: → A Fast Straight ↖/↑/↗/↘/↓/↙ A Directional Hit ← A Parry ↗/→/↘ B Fastslow ↖/←/↙ B Slowfast → C Time freeze (2 meter) ← C Time rewind (3 meter) Skeleton: ↖/↑/↗/→/↘/↓/↙ A Directional Hit ← A Bunt ← B Self Serve ↑/↓ B Hook ↗/↘ B Slider C Bump (1 meter) ↗/→/↘ C Superslam (2 meter) Winning:

Rounds are first to 5 points, win by 2

Matches are best 2 out of 3

UI:

You can drag windows around, double click the title bar to minimize them
